title: Moomin and the Little Dragon
description: In a world where the Moomins' friend, Snufkin, discovers the last dragon, there is a balance between "the commonplace and the fantastic". The Moomintrolls were conceived of in 1948 and will be featured on a new BBC television series. The Moomins first appeared in the "London Evening News" in 1954.
author: Tove Jansson
